Name: Imagine Me
About the game: Help Robbe reclaim his memories in this 2D, dungeon platformer. Search spike-filled dungeons for the exit, unlock memories, face his darkest fears - and maybe some of your own. Imagine Me was originally released to Steam Early Access in March 2014. The development team worked closely with the Steam community to grow and shape the game into what it is today. The Imagine Me team includes all of the Early Access community members who devoted time and effort to the development of Imagine Me.
